name: Atom
author: INTAKE Digital
description: Atom - is a unique and dynamic theme designed specifically for Neutrino. This theme is intended for modern web projects, offering a stylish and professional appearance that attracts attention and creates a strong visual impression. Dark tones combined with bright accents give the site an elegant and contemporary look, making it appealing to users. Dynamic design elements add interactivity and bring pages to life, helping to capture visitors' attention and enhance their interaction with the site.
